titleInfo.title: K104's KFest 2017 at Bethel Woods Center for the Arts

mods.abstract: Three color window card (pink, yellow and split fountain, blue to white, on white) announcing K104's KFest 2017 with Jason Derulo, Sean Paul, Jon Bellion, Austin Mahoney, Tinashe, Dua Lipa, Clean Bandit, Matoma, the Vamps, Aaron Carter and Kyle at the Bethel Woods Center for the Arts on June 17. Poster features a woodcut of hills.
